# TOPSIS Python Package

## Installation
pip install Topsis-Aditya-102303526


## Usage
topsis data.xlsx "1,1,1,1,2" "+,+,-,+,+" output.csv


## Description
This package implements the Technique for Order Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS).

## Requirements
- Python 3.x
- pandas
- numpy
- openpyxl
